---
layout: post
title: css画内圆角
tags: [css]
---


*[查看demo](/assets/demo/border-radius-conversely.html){:target="_blank"}*
```
.b-r-c {
    width: 100px;
    padding: 10px;
    font-size: 12px;
    color: #f23d30;
    background:
        url(data:image/png;base64,) 0 no-repeat,
        url(data:image/png;base64,) 100% no-repeat;
    border-top: 1px solid #f23d30;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #f23d30;
    cursor: pointer;
    margin-top: 2px;
}
  
```
